labels.shortDescription: It was not possible to find the test object information
labels.value: The object {0} could not be found.

labels.shortDescription: When a request is made to fetch a token, but no configuration has been set
labels.value: The Metadata API Client is not configured.

labels.shortDescription: Response to a Data Not Found exception from the Apex JWT support code
labels.value: The Metadata API Client reported "Data Not Found". Check that the Named Certificate exists.

labels.shortDescription: Response to invalid_grant message from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}". Check that the Connected App is set to use a digital certificate and Admin Must Authorize Users.

labels.shortDescription: Response to invalid client ID message from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}". Check the consumer key in the Metadata API Client Settings

labels.shortDescription: Response to invalid client message from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}". Check the certificate in the Metadata API Client Settings

labels.shortDescription: Response to Invalid App Access message from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}". Check that you have permission to access to Connected App

labels.shortDescription: Response to Invalid Request message from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}"

labels.shortDescription: Fallback message in case of unknown result code from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded {0}: {1}

labels.shortDescription: Fallback message in case of unparseable response from the authentication server
labels.value: Failed to request an access token for Salesforce API. The login server responded "{0}"

labels.shortDescription: The scopes returned by the authentication server do not match those required
labels.value: The Metadata API Client Connected App does not have the required scope: {0}. Add this scope to the Connected App.

labels.shortDescription: The scopes returned by the authentication server do not match those required
labels.value: The Metadata API Client Connected App does not have the required scopes: {0}. Add these scopes to the Connected App.
